title: Homura to God: The Proof to the Last Theorem
description: Fermat's Last Theorem, the most difficult problem in mathematics that had fascinated mathematicians around the world for 350 years, was solved by a young mathematician in 1951 in postwar Japan. His name was Andy Homura. His life and the history of mathematics were set in motion by the appearance of a great genius, a girl named Rama.
author: Yoshikage
